adrFormatAddress: 80 5th Ave #1508, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text: Going to Ronni has been the best decision of my life! I had a terrible experience with laser hair removal that left me with more hair than I had originally. A derm friend referred me to Ronni and it truly changed my life. (Ask any of my friends it‚Äôs the only thing I talk about!) Skip all your other hair removal methods, electrolysis with Ronni is the ONLY answer! Not to mention Ronni is the best, funniest person ever - I genuinely look forward to our appointments not only for hair removal, but also for catching up and chatting with her!

originalText.text: I started seeing Ronni 2 years ago for my eyebrows. I am now completed my sessions and never have to go get my eyebrows waxed or threaded again. They look beautiful and it is so nice to have to never spend money or time on them ever again! Ronni is very professional. I never had to wait for her to see me. Her reminders are super helpful as well. I highly recommend!

originalText.text: Ronni is simply the best. She fit me in last minute for a first session with her before I went out of town. She operates extremely gently, causing minimal pain for what can often be such a painful process (electrolysis!) Thank you to her for great results.

text.text: Ronni is simply the best. She fit me in last minute for a first session with her before I went out of town. She operates extremely gently, causing minimal pain for what can often be such a painful process (electrolysis!) Thank you to her for great results.

originalText.text: This review is LONG over DUE!! I was experiencing hair on my chin. As a woman it was very unpleasant. I was blessed to find Ronnie who was able to to help me get rid of unwanted hair. I was skeptic at first. But after reading her book and doing my own research, I was able to know the good benefits of Electrolysis. This is a process in which you have to commit to. You cannot go for one day and think that the hair will just go away. It does take time and work on your end. The work on your end would have to FOLLOW the rules! You can't use tweezers, wax, thread or pull any hair. This will SABOTAGE the process!!!! If you follow her rules and be consistent then you will get the results. If you don't follow the rules then you might as well throw money out the window. Each person is different meaning it could take months for the hair to be completely gone. This woman has changed my life for the better... The office is clean and quiet. Ronnie and her staff are very professional. Yes it is costly but at the end of the day, the office offers packages. And also the money is WELL SPENT!!!! Ronnie and her staff are very strict with time frames because they are running a business. So it is very important that you cancel within the time frames given. I do plan on telling friends and family. And I will be going back if I happen to get unwanted hair on another part of my body. Please make an appointment!! It will change your life...If you are worried about scars, the scars disappear over time. During the session you feel a little pinch. But it's not as painful as waxing or using a tweezers. The hair hasn't come back.. Time frame it took for me was close to a year. At first I had to go every other week or week.. Then soon after I started going once a month until the hair stop growing back.. Again everyone is different..
